content: I'm actually looking for a high-quality coat that can last for a long time, so I'm willing to invest a bit. I've been eyeing Canada Goose, but I'm not sure if it's worth the price. Can you tell me more about their quality and durability? And by the way, I also picked up a few graphic t-shirts from H&M when I got my distressed denim jeans, which I've been layering under my cardigans for a casual look.
